From the elder, to an elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth (and not I alone, but also all those who know the truth),
undefined because of the truth that resides in us and will be with us forever.
undefined Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us from God the Father and from Jesus Christ the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
undefined I rejoiced greatly because I have found some of your children living according to the truth, just as the Father commanded us.Warning Against False Teachers
undefined But now I ask you, lady (not as if I were writing a new commandment to you, but the one we have had from the beginning), that we love one another.
undefined (Now this is love: that we walk according to his command-ments.) This is the commandment, just as you have heard from the beginning; thus you should walk in it.
undefined For many deceivers have gone out into the world, people who do not confess Jesus as Christ coming in the flesh. This person is the deceiver and the antichrist!
undefined Watch out, so that you do not lose the things we have worked for, but receive a full reward.
undefined Everyone who goes on ahead and does not remain in the teaching of Christ does not have God. The one who remains in this teach-ing has both the Father and the Son.
undefined If anyone comes to you and does not bring this teaching, do not receive him into your house and do not give him any greeting,
undefined because the person who gives him a greeting shares in his evil deeds.
undefined Though I have many other things to write to you, I do not want to do so with pa-per and ink, but I hope to come visit you and speak face to face, so that our joy may be complete.
undefined The children of your elect sister greet you.
